query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Initial Application-specific iFLEX Assistant prototypes
result.description: This deliverable will create a software framework for modelling and optimization of consumer flexibility management that leads in more efficient system which can manage demand and production flexibility for prosumers and is based on the data that is provided by HEMS, DSO and energy supplier

result.title: Final market analysis and iFLEX business models
result.description: The deliverable will include the final version of the market analysis with detailed definition of obstacles in the categories of regulatory limitations, business model viability, data management requirements and consumer engagement. In addition, final business cases are identified and evaluated by measuring value creation and identifying new business opportunities.

result.title: Dissemination and Communication Plan
result.description: The Dissemination and Communication plan will detail stakeholder engagement through multiple media channels (social media, web, conferences, webinars). It will target participants in the value chain and other complimentary research and development efforts. It will contain provisions for protection of personal data and a schedule of all Current Direct events. It is an output of T9.2 and describes the activities of T9.3.

result.title: Design Recommendations EaaS
result.description: Design Recommendations for the for the Current Direct Energy as a Service (EaaS) software platform will clearly describe verifiable, independent performance and business requirements . Certain requirements will be specified as Key Performance Indicators (KPIs). The requirements will synthesize inputs from suppliers, operators, classification societies, governments, and recyclers. They are the output of T2.2.
